verses.name: 2 Kings 19:4
verses.text: It may be the Lord thy God will hear all the words of Rab–shakeh, whom the king of Assyria his master hath sent to reproach the living God; and will reprove the words which the Lord thy God hath heard: wherefore lift up thy prayer for the remnant that are left.

verses.name: 2 Kings 19:5
verses.text: So the servants of king Hezekiah came to Isaiah.

verses.name: 2 Kings 19:6
verses.text: And Isaiah said unto them, Thus shall ye say to your master, Thus saith the Lord, Be not afraid of the words which thou hast heard, with which the servants of the king of Assyria have blasphemed me.
